definition[0]: someone who collects money for a charity, political party etc, for example by arranging social events that people pay to attend
definition[1]: an event that is organized to collect money for a charity, political party etc
definition[2]: a person or event that collects money for a political party, CHARITY etc
example[0]: He worked in the past as a fundraiser for the Institute of Contemporary Arts.
example[1]: The First Lady is scheduled to attend three fundraisers this week.
